OOC: roughly how big is Shivah? I couldn't find his bio on the site...

BIC:
Ragnus watched as the other Dragon flew away.  Processing the co-
ordinates, he absorbed a last bit of energon before leaving on his 
long journey to the base.  During his flight he planned for what was 
to come, making sure his weapons were ready and adjusting his 
scanners.  After all he was not a trusting robot, and of coure, he 
was expecting a trap.


> Shivah:
> 
> "Like I said... you're looking as enemy who is your ally" replied 
> Shivah "Decepticon are Predacons' ancestors and our allies in this 
> war... If you wish to be alone, I leave you... YOur decepticon base 
> is around and if you like to arrive soon follow this coordinates 
> (Send to Ragnus the coordinates to the base)-Then Ragnus The Red, I 
> leave you...  "
> 
> He did a small bow and started fly way of that place
